page.title: Templates
page.detail_description: View and edit template details and assigned agents

no_templates_description: Create your first template to get started.
confirm_delete_template: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
template_id_missing: Template ID is missing from the URL.
unable_to_fetch_template: Unable to fetch template details. Please try again.
template_not_found_desc: The requested template could not be found.
template_info_desc: Configuration and model settings for this template.
no_agents_using_template: No agents are currently using this template.
delete_template_warning: This action cannot be undone. The template will be permanently deleted and removed from all agents.
remove_agent_warning: This will unassign the template from this agent. The agent will no longer use this template.
select_agent_desc: Choose an agent to assign this template to.
no_agents_found: No agents found matching your search.
no_available_agents: No available agents. All agents already have this template assigned.
set_as_active_for_agent: Set as active template for this agent
templates_description: Manage your conversation templates for quick setup and consistent responses
